meanings.sent1: The multiemployer agreement was signed by several companies.
meanings.sent2: The multiemployer healthcare plan covered employees from different businesses.
meanings.sent3: The multiemployer picnic brought together workers from various companies for a fun day out.
meanings.sent4: The multiemployer alliance was as strong as a chain with many links.
meanings.sent5: The concept of multiemployer projects can be complex but beneficial for all involved.

meanings.definition: A pension plan to which two or more employers contribute.
meanings.sent1: The multiemployer pension fund ensured retirement benefits for workers from different companies.
meanings.sent2: Employees from multiple businesses were part of the same multiemployer retirement plan.
meanings.sent3: The multiemployer pension scheme made saving for the future easier for many workers.
meanings.sent4: Joining the multiemployer pension program was like investing in a shared financial security blanket.
meanings.sent5: The multiemployer pension fund was a safety net for employees from various employers.
